abstract: The bankers underwriting First Data’s $13 billion of leveraged loans were set to close the books on the first $5 billion piece Tuesday evening with orders outstripping supply, Dow Jones Newswires reported, citing unnamed sources.
lead_paragraph: The bankers underwriting First Data’s $13 billion of leveraged loans were set to close the books on the first $5 billion piece Tuesday evening with orders outstripping supply, Dow Jones Newswires reported, citing unnamed sources.

headline.main: First Data Loan Offering Set to Close
